me.taylorkelly.mywarp

Class MyWarp

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.taylorkelly.mywarp.MyWarp

  • public final class MyWarp
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point and container for a working MyWarp implementation.

    An instance of this class holds and manages MyWarp's internal logic. It is initialized with a Platform which provides MyWarp with the connection to the game.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static MyWarp initialize(Platform platform)
                         throws StorageInitializationException,
                                java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a MyWarp instance that runs on the given platform.

        If this method returns the instance without raising any exceptions, MyWarp's internal logic has been successfully initialized and MyWarp is fully operational. Any additional service implemented by the client should thus be ready to operate.

        Warps might no yet be available, but are scheduled to be loaded from the storage system. Once they are available, Platform.onWarpsLoaded() will be called on platform.

        Parameters:
        platform - the platform MyWarp will run on
        Returns:
        a fully operational instance of MyWarp that runs on platform
        Throws:
        StorageInitializationException - if the Storage system could not be initialized
        java.sql.SQLException - if the DataService offered by platform does not provide a valid DataSource

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Reloads MyWarp.

        Reloading will remove all loaded warps from the active WarpManager and reload them from the configured storage. Interaction models (commands, signs...) are newly created. The platform running MyWarp may reload the user configuration from disk.
